comment: Opa! Chegou a turfa. Um Highland Park turfado!!!! Turfa muito leve. Complexidade na boca e boa permanência. Indico!
“Smoky & bold” indeed. Very much on the smoky and salty side for Highland Park, but still has that honey sweetness. 91
Smooth on nosing, with some peaty and salt
Smooth first sip, Burns a little in the middle
Nice balance of smoothness with a little smoke

Light smoky and peaty; tasty, pleasantly 
-87
A lovely and affordable peaty single malt for the great Highland Park. I prefer a little bit of peat to whiskey, and this works with a rich mouthfeel.

Nosing sweetness,  light peppery, 
2.5

Flavour incredibly salty, light pepper, woody
0.25

Salty, woody

Vanilla honey sweetness with a bit of acetone, and kind of a long alcohol burn on finish. Not bad, but can tell it's young. Unsure if I'd buy again.
